# Higher Layer Capsule


- The outputs of the [Primary Capsule](Primary Capsule.qmd) are then passed to higher-layer capsules, which **combine the information from multiple primary capsules** to extract more abstract concepts, such as the identity of an object or the presence of a face.
- [Routing by Agreement](Routing by Agreement.qmd)
